snippet: Chris Wondolowski, who had both goals in a 2-0 victory over South Korea, could be the goal scorer the Americans need as they head toward World Cup play.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Chris Wondolowski, who had both goals in a 2-0 victory over South Korea, could be the goal scorer the Americans need as they head toward World Cup play; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Wondolowski, who had both goals in a 2-0 victory over South Korea, could be the goal scorer the Americans need as they head toward World Cup play.

headline.main: As the U.S. Seeks a Scorer, One Player Finds the Goal
headline.print_headline: As the U.S. Seeks a Scorer, One Player Finds the Goal
